name: The Majestic Chateau and Orangery
description:
DESCRIPTION
Set in vast swathes of romantic parkland, surrounded by a picturesque moat, this magnificent architectural masterpiece could provide the ideal setting for your big day, adding grandeur and elegance to any event.
L'Orangerie at the Chateau
The Orangery is now available to host 180 guests for a sit-down dinner and 300 guests for a cocktail reception in its beautiful space.
It is roughly 200m² an includes a separate hallway, cloakroom, toilets, audiovisual equipment and much more...
You are welcome to choose your own caterer and the space is equipped with a professional kitchen.
There is also a private terrace of 100 m2 and a stunning and spacious private garden of about 700 m2
Furniture available: 18 oval tables with a capacity of 8 people and 180 white plastic chairs type "Miami" - other furniture can be arrange with local suppliers if desired.
These prices include the gîte for 22 people opposite the Orangerie area but in total three gites are available and can accommodate up to 30 guests. There is also the opportunity to rent the château's main courtyard from 7 p.m. in July and August (6 p.m. otherwise).
Cleaning, all charges and lighting of the façade of the castle are included in the rental price.
The Rear View of the Chateau
This perspective allows you to make the most of the exceptional setting. The cocktail reception can be held in the courtyard of the castle and on the other side you can set up a marquee for your reception and dinner. The maximum capacity depends on the size of the marquee (max 62m wide by 270m deep) and there is a water and electricity connection available.
Indoors
Your guests can enjoy a cocktail reception in the Cour d'honneur then the guests can cross the Château via the main staircase. Please note that some areas of the Chateau remain private and are not accessible to guests or visitors.
If you would like you can also have a wonderful brunch the following morning in the marquee or in the Orangery
Prices for the rear lawn of the Chateau, Orangerie, inside spaces and gites:
Weekday package (10h-6h): from € 3,000
Weekend package (from Thursday 2 p.m. to Sunday 5 p.m.): from € 3,000
Accommodation:
The gîte is a 17th century commons building classified as a Historic Monument, located next to the castle in the wing of the commons.
It can accommodate up to 8 people.
Rental for 2 nights minimum, 3 with a bank holiday weekend.
160 € per night or 320 € for two nights.
Options:
• Courtyard of honor (from 7:00pm in July-August, otherwise 6:00pm): €300
• Water jets: €50 per hour
• Opening of the gate of honor: €200
For more information please do get in touch and we will send through a bespoke quotation.
additional_info:

Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
